events.message: We received John Doe's application for the software engineer position early this morning, indicating strong interest in joining our development team.
John's application was categorized under Engineering due to his background as a software developer with relevant skills in backend and devops.
Recruiter Jane Smith was assigned to handle John's application and begin communication about the next recruitment steps.
The initial phone screening was conducted successfully, where John demonstrated solid understanding of software engineering principles and expressed enthusiasm for the role.
John promptly responded to the follow-up email confirming his availability for the technical interview next week and showed eagerness to proceed.
The technical interview was successfully scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC, giving John ample time to prepare for the in-depth coding evaluation.
